summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of Thirtieth Avenue Northeast, from Blakely Street to East Fifty-fifth Street; of East Fifty-third Street, between Twenty-ninth Avenue Northeast and Thirtieth Avenue Northeast, and of the alley between East Fifty-third Street and East Fifty-fourth Street, from Thirtieth Avenue Northeast, as provided for in Ordinance No. 46794, of said City, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
